mapper.select: SELECT a.ID,b.service_name,a.serviceTime,a.serviceState FROM service_order a LEFT JOIN service b ON a.SERVICE_ID=b.ID WHERE a.SC=1
SELECT a.ID,b.service_name,a.serviceTime,a.serviceState FROM service_order a LEFT JOIN service b ON a.SERVICE_ID=b.ID WHERE a.SC>1
select a.order_id as orderId, b.service_name as serviceName, b.ad_img_path as adImgPath, a.money, a.sc from service_order a left join service b on a.service_id=b.id where a.order_id=#{orderId}

select a.order_id orderId, a.money money, DATE_FORMAT(a.createtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createtime, DATE_FORMAT(a.serviceTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') serviceTime, a.remark remark, a.state state, d.vl stateN, b.service_name serviceName, b.ad_img_path adImgPath, b.PERIOD period, c.community community, c.houseNumber houseNumber, c.uName uName, c.uIphone uIphone from service_order a LEFT JOIN service b on a.service_id=b.id left join address c on a.address_id = c.id LEFT JOIN dict d on a.state = d.KY where a.order_id=#{orderId}
